net.coobird.thumbnailator.resizers
Interface Resizer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractResizer, BicubicResizer, BilinearResizer, NullResizer, ProgressiveBilinearResizer, Resizers
public interface Resizer

This interface is implemented by classes which perform resizing operations.

Author:
coobird

Method Summary
 void resize(BufferedImage srcImage, BufferedImage destImage)
          Resizes an image.
 

Method Detail

resize

void resize(BufferedImage srcImage,
            BufferedImage destImage)
Resizes an image.

The source image is resized to fit the dimensions of the destination image and drawn.

Parameters:
srcImage - The source image.
destImage - The destination image.
